alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:26PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Millard County through 300 PM MDT... At 226 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 26 miles west of Kanosh, or 30 miles west of Fillmore, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Millard County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties
